entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
